code: import{createStore}from"redux";import user from"./User.js";function getdate(){var date=new Date();var YYYY=date.getFullYear();var MM=date.getMonth()+1;var DD=date.getDate();if(MM<10){MM="0"+MM;}if(DD<10){DD="0"+DD;}return MM+"-"+DD+"-"+YYYY;}var initialData={data:{1:{id:1,title:"A bug in Top Page",status:0,description:"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.",ctuser:"",ctdate:getdate(),update:getdate()},2:{id:2,title:"A problem of performance in Top Page",status:0,description:"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.",ctuser:"",ctdate:getdate(),update:getdate()},3:{id:3,title:"fix layout",status:0,description:"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.",ctuser:"",ctdate:getdate(),update:getdate()}}};initialData.index=Object.values(initialData.data).length;var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialData;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var newState={data:""};switch(action.type){case"add_issue":var index=++state.index;var _ref=action.payload||{},title=_ref.title,description=_ref.description;state.data[index]={id:index,title:title,description:description,status:0,ctuser:user.name,ctdate:getdate(),update:getdate()};console.log(state);newState=state;return newState;case"edit_issue":var _action$payload=action.payload,id=_action$payload.id,textedit=_action$payload.textedit,descriptionedit=_action$payload.descriptionedit,statusedit=_action$payload.statusedit;state.data[id].title=textedit;state.data[id].description=descriptionedit;state.data[id].status=statusedit;newState=state;return newState;case"delete_issue":var delete_id=action.payload;delete_id.forEach(function(e){return delete state.data[e];});newState=state;return newState;default:return state;}};var store=createStore(reducer);export default store;
